text: The use of artificial empathy strategies in human-AI interactions has become a focal point in the development of more responsive and humane technology. This research explores the optimization of human-AI interactions through the application of artificial empathy strategies to enhance affective and social customer experiences. The qualitative research approach involves reviewing various studies and literature related to the topic. Data sources include journals, articles, and books relevant to the research topic. The research findings indicate that implementing artificial empathy strategies in human-AI interactions can significantly improve the quality of interactions and customer experiences. Technologies such as natural language processing, emotion recognition, and sentiment analysis enable AI to respond more accurately and sensitively to user needs and emotions.
